titleStmt.title: The orchard, and the garden [con]taining cer[tai]ne necessarie, secret, and ordinarie knowledges in grafting and gardening. Wherein are described sundrie waies to graffe, and diuerse proper new plots for the garden. Gathered from the Dutch and French. Also to know the time and season, when it is good to sow and replant all manner of seedes.

notesStmt.note: An enlarged reprint of: A short instruction verie profitable and necessarie for all those that delight in gardening (STC 14106.5).
Imperfect; title page torn, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
